  • Method Details

    • isVisitingFields

      boolean isVisitingFields(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns:
      if true the class' fields shall be visited

    • isVisitingField

      boolean isVisitingField(Field field)
      Returns:
      true if the visit(Field) method shall be executed on the given field

    • visit

      boolean visit(Field field)
      Returns:
      false if the class hierarchy visit shall be aborted

    • isVisitingMethods

      boolean isVisitingMethods(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns:
      if true the class' methods shall be visited

    • isVisitingMethod

      boolean isVisitingMethod(Method method)
      Returns:
      true if the visit(Method) method shall be executed on the given method

    • visit

      boolean visit(Method method)
      Returns:
      false if the class hierarchy visit shall be aborted

    • visit

      boolean visit(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns:
      false if the class hierarchy visit shall be aborted

    • isVisiting

      boolean isVisiting(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns:
      if the class shall be visited

    • isVisitingSuperclass

      boolean isVisitingSuperclass(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns:
      if true the superclass shall be visited

    • isVisitingInterfaces

      boolean isVisitingInterfaces(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns:
      if true the implemented interfaces shall be visited
